amendment.description: To remove certain provisions relating to administrative and judicial review.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2039 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 33. Record Vote Number: 423.
Amendment SA 2039 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S13609-13611; text: CR S13611) To remove certain provisions relating to administrative and judicial review.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2039 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 33. Record Vote Number: 423.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2039 proposed by Senator Leahy.
